channel.title: 2016 on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)
channel.description: Recent content in 2016 on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)

item.title: 2016 - That was a Year :-)
item.description: Its the time of year for reflection and I have had the most amazing 2016, I am blessed that I love what I do so much. I thoroughly enjoy writing and talking and sharing and commenting and supporting and cherishing all the SQL and PowerShell things. I wrote about using Power Bi to display my checkins. I only started this in June and this is where I have been :-)
